Marwa Rakha (a mụrụ n'afọ 1978) bụ onye Ijipt na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta na mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwaanyị

Rakha bụ onye mmekọrịta na ndụmọdụ a kpọtụrụ aha n'ọtụtụ ebe na Egypt na Arab World, na-apụtakarị na mbipụta na usoro mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi, ọkachasị ihe ngosi okwu, a makwaara ya nke ọma maka echiche esemokwu ya banyere mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwa agbọghọbia na-amaghị nwoke. Ọrụ ya a maara nke ọma bụ The Poison Tree: Planted and Grown in Egypt
Rakha gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ain Shams na 1996 na nzere na akwụkwọ Bekee
Tupu ọ ghọọ onye edemede mmekọrịta na mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwaanyị, Rakha nwere otutu ọrụ dịgasị iche iche gụnyere onye nnabata na onye nduzi ahịa maka ụlọ nkwari akụ
N'afọ 2005, ọ malitere ibipụta isiokwu mgbe ọ na-akụzi ihe na Mahadum America dị na Cairo
Akwụkwọ ya, The Poison Tree: Planted and Grown in Egypt, pụtara na Jenụwarị 2008
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2008, ọ bidoro ihe ngosi redio Arabic ma n'ọnwa Juun, ọ malitere nsụgharị Bekee

Ọ na-akụzi ahịa ugbu a na Mahadum America dị na Cairo ma na-ede maka magazin asụsụ Bekee atọ, otu akwụkwọ akụkọ na magazin Arabic, na weebụsaịtị abụọ. A gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ ogologo oge banyere echiche ya banyere alụmdi na nwunye na mmekọrịta n'akwụkwọ "Sex and the Citadel".
A maara Rakha nke oma na obodo Arab World maka echiche esemokwu ya banyere ọtụtụ isiokwu metụtara mmekọrịta na ahụike mmekọahụ

O kwuru, sị, "A zụlitere m ka m bụrụ ezigbo nwa agbọghọ Ijipt; mana n'ụzọ ụfọdụ, ịdị mma adabaghị n'echiche m...Enweghị m ike ịghọta ihe mere e ji gbuo ụmụ agbọghọbia, gbuo onwe ha, ma ọ bụ bie ndụ na ihere ebighi ebi mgbe ha tụfuru nwa agbọghọbia nke na-amaghị nwoke
Amaghị m ihe mere iwu dị otú ahụ ji emetụta naanị ụmụ agbọghọbia na ụmụ nwoke ibe ha ji dị ndụ

Edere ya n'ọtụtụ ụdị, The Poison Tree: Planted and Grown in Egypt na-ekpuchi isiokwu sitere na alụmdi na nwunye, ịgba alụkwaghịm, mmekọahụ, mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwa agbọghọ na nwanyị, okpukpe, na agha nwoke na nwanyị. E wepụtara akwụkwọ ahụ na Jenụwarị, 2008.
